# Getting Support for RDAPify

Thank you for using RDAPify! This document will help you get the support you need.

## üìö Documentation

Before asking for help, please check our comprehensive documentation:

### Getting Started
- **[Quick Start Guide](../docs/getting_started/quick_start.md)** - Get up and running in 5 minutes
- **[Installation Guide](../docs/getting_started/installation.md)** - Detailed installation instructions
- **[First Query Tutorial](../docs/getting_started/first_query.md)** - Make your first RDAP query

### Common Issues
- **[Troubleshooting Guide](../docs/troubleshooting/)** - Solutions to common problems
- **[FAQ](../docs/troubleshooting/faq.md)** - Frequently asked questions
- **[Common Errors](../docs/troubleshooting/common_errors.md)** - Error messages explained

### API Reference
- **[API Documentation](../docs/api_reference/)** - Complete API reference
- **[TypeScript Types](../docs/api_reference/types/)** - Type definitions
- **[Examples](../examples/)** - Code examples

## üí¨ Community Support

### GitHub Discussions (Recommended)
The best place for questions and discussions:

- **[Q&A](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/q-a)** - Ask questions
- **[Ideas](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/ideas)** - Share feature ideas
- **[Show and Tell](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/show-and-tell)** - Share your projects

üëâ [Start a Discussion](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/new)

**Response Time:** Usually within 24-48 hours

### Search Existing Issues
Someone may have already encountered your problem:

1. Search [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues)
2. Search [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions)
3. Check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/rdapify) (tag: `rdapify`)

## üêõ Bug Reports

If you've found a bug, please report it:

1. **Check if it's already reported**: Search [existing issues](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues)
2. **Create a new issue**: Use our [bug report template](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
3. **Include details**:
   - RDAPify version
   - Node.js version
   - Operating system
   - Minimal reproduction code
   - Expected vs actual behavior
   - Error messages and stack traces

**Response Time:** Critical bugs within 24 hours, others within 48-72 hours

## ‚ú® Feature Requests

Have an idea for a new feature?

1. **Check the roadmap**: See [ROADMAP.md](../ROADMAP.md)
2. **Search discussions**: Check if it's already proposed
3. **Create a feature request**: Use our [feature request template](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
4. **Explain the use case**: Why is this feature valuable?

**Response Time:** Within 1 week

## üîí Security Issues

**DO NOT** report security vulnerabilities publicly!

### Private Reporting
- **GitHub Security Advisories**: [Report a vulnerability](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/security/advisories/new)
- **Email**: security@rdapify.com (planned)

### What to Include
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

**Response Time:** Within 48 hours

See our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for more details.

## üíº Commercial Support

### Community Edition (Free)
- GitHub Discussions support
- Community-driven help
- Best-effort response times

### Enterprise Support (Planned)
For organizations requiring:
- Priority support (SLA-backed)
- Private support channels
- Custom feature development
- Training and consulting
- Dedicated account manager

**Contact:** enterprise@rdapify.com (planned)

## üåê Community Channels

### Real-Time Chat (Planned)
- **Matrix/Element**: #rdapify:matrix.org
- **Discord**: discord.gg/rdapify

### Social Media (Planned)
- **Twitter**: [@rdapify](https://twitter.com/rdapify)
- **LinkedIn**: [RDAPify](https://linkedin.com/company/rdapify)

### Office Hours (Planned)
- **When**: Thursdays 2PM UTC
- **Where**: Video call (link in Discussions)
- **What**: Live Q&A with maintainers

## üìä Response Time Expectations

| Type | Response Time | Resolution Time |
|------|---------------|-----------------|
| Critical Security Bug | 24 hours | 48-72 hours |
| Critical Bug | 24 hours | 3-5 days |
| Regular Bug | 48-72 hours | 1-2 weeks |
| Feature Request | 1 week | Varies |
| Question | 24-48 hours | N/A |
| Documentation | 48-72 hours | 1 week |

*Note: These are community-driven best-effort times. Enterprise support offers SLA-backed guarantees.*

## ü§ù Contributing

Want to help others? Consider:

- **Answering questions** in Discussions
- **Reviewing pull requests**
- **Improving documentation**
- **Writing tutorials**
- **Sharing your experience**

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.
